data.comment: The big names in today's match at Allianz Field have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 2, Ramy Touchan signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Minnesota's area.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Ethan Finlay for Minnesota drives towards goal at Allianz Field. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Throw-in for Kansas City at Allianz Field.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
In Saint Paul, Roger Espinoza of Kansas City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 9, Kansas City push upfield but Ramy Touchan quickly pulls them for offside.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Minnesota.
In Saint Paul Minnesota attack through Chase Gasper. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Allianz Field.
In the minute 11, Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gadi Kinda puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
That's a fine assist from Jaylin Lindsey.
In the minute 13, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Minnesota.
Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Minnesota.
Kansas City drive upfield and Khiry Shelton gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Minnesota defender.
In the minute 16, Khiry Shelton (Kansas City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Alan Pulido gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kansas City.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 16, Free kick Kansas City.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Minnesota.
In the minute 18, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Kansas City are pushing forward but Graham Zusi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 19, Ramy Touchan awards Minnesota a goal kick.
Ramy Touchan awards the away team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Paul.
In the minute 23, Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jose Aja (Minnesota) has received a yellow card from Ramy Touchan.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Hassani Dotson of Minnesota smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
In the minute 27, In Saint Paul, Jose Aja (Minnesota) misses the target with a header.
Kansas City have a goal kick.
Throw-in Kansas City.
In the minute 28, Ramy Touchan signals a Minnesota throw-in in Kansas City's half.
Throw-in for Kansas City at Allianz Field.
Throw-in Kansas City.
In the minute 31, Minnesota to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kansas City have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Jaylin Lindsey grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Allianz Field.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Paul.
In the minute 34, Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
Kansas City advance rapidly upfield but Ramy Touchan blows for offside.
Goal kick for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
In the minute 40, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Minnesota.
Minnesota needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Minnesota.
Can Kansas City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Kansas City's Gadi Kinda is on target but unsuccessful.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Saint Paul.
In the minute 46, Ramy Touchan awards Kansas City a goal kick.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Minnesota.
Gianluca Busio (Kansas City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Hassani Dotson (Minnesota) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
In the minute 48, Jose Aja (Minnesota) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Paul.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Kansas City.
In the minute 51, Gianluca Busio of Kansas City is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Minnesota just outside Kansas City's area.
In the minute 53, Jan Gregus (Minnesota) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
Minnesota's Luis Amarilla misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Kansas City at Allianz Field.
Own goal in Saint Paul! Michael Boxall scores in his own net to make it 1-2.
Ramy Touchan signals a Minnesota throw-in in Kansas City's half.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kansas City have a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Free kick Kansas City.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Minnesota.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 60, Johnny Russell (Kansas City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Throw-in for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
In the minute 62, Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Raheem Edwards is on a sub for Kevin Molino for Minnesota.
In the minute 66, Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Adrian Heath is making the team's second substitution at Allianz Field with Robin Lod replacing Ethan Finlay.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Minnesota.
In the minute 69, Kansas City's Graham Zusi gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Field. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Minnesota to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
In the minute 71, Gianluca Busio of Kansas City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Throw-in Kansas City.
In the minute 72, Peter Vermes (Kansas City) is making a first substitution, with Cameron Duke replacing Gadi Kinda.
Gerso Fernandes is replacing Khiry Shelton for Kansas City at Allianz Field.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 73, Ramy Touchan awards Kansas City a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
Kansas City make their third substitution with Felipe Hernandez replacing Roger Espinoza.
In the minute 76, Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 77, Ramy Touchan awards the away team a throw-in.
Alan Pulido for Kansas City has been booked by Ramy Touchan and receives a first yellow card.
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 79, Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ramy Touchan signals a Minnesota throw-in in Kansas City's half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 82, Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Hassani Dotson with Aaron Schoenfeld.
The home team have replaced Luis Amarilla with Mason Toye. This is the third substitution made today by Adrian Heath.
In the minute 82, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jaylin Lindsey for Kansas City who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in Minnesota.
Jaylin Lindsey for Kansas City is back on the field again.
In the minute 85, Roberto Puncec is replacing Johnny Russell for the away team.
Minnesota have a dangerous throw-in.
Ramy Touchan awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Kansas City.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Paul.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Ramy Touchan will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Free kick Kansas City.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Minnesota are in shooting range from this free kick.
Minnesota's Michael Boxall gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
Osvaldo Alonso (Minnesota) has received a first yellow card.
At Allianz Field, Cameron Duke has been yellow-carded for the away team.
